def_en: Someone who is divorced from their former husband or wife has separated from them and is no longer legally married to them.

def_cn: 脱离…的;与…完全不一样的
def_en: If you say that one thing is divorced from another, you mean that the two things are very different and separate from each other.

def_cn: 不受…影响的;置身世外的
def_en: If you say that someone is divorced from a situation, you mean that they act as if they are not affected by it in any way.
